pageProduct.name: Schick Hydro Silk Blades 4 pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Go beyond a close shave with clinically proven, lasting hydration*!

The Schick Hydro Silk® Refill Blades feature water-activated Hydra-Renew™ serum formulated with shea butter and have 5-curve sensing blades to give you incredible closeness, while following the natural shape of your body. The cartridge is perfect for accessing hard-to reach areas, and each blade includes unique skin guards to smooth skin and help prevent irritation.
